body: I only ran the by Go supplied `go build` command with the GOOS and GOARCH env. variables set on the `android` and `arm`. It worked flawlessly for windows/amd64 and linux/arm with the standard settings of my compile environment. No CC_FOR_TARGET variable thet environment. Forgive me, but as I said above, compilation intimidates me and I have a (very) limited experience in that. What value should I set to CC_FOR_TARGET variable?
